trans-unit.source: Provides an interface that extends <xref href="System.ComponentModel.Design.Serialization.IDesignerLoaderHost"></xref> to specify whether errors are tolerated while loading a design document.
Use the IDesignerLoaderHost2 interface to specify whether the designer loader can continue loading when errors occur during deserialization.
Gets or sets a value indicating whether it is possible to reload with errors.
In some scenarios, loading errors cannot be ignored.
The designer loader implementation should return `false` when this is the case.

<xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> if the designer loader can reload the design document when errors are detected; otherwise, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
The default is <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
Gets or sets a value indicating whether errors should be ignored when <xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.Serialization.IDesignerLoaderHost.Reload*> is called.
The IgnoreErrorsDuringReload property can only be set to `true` if <xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.Serialization.IDesignerLoaderHost2.CanReloadWithErrors%2A> is `true`.
If <xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.Serialization.IDesignerLoaderHost2.CanReloadWithErrors%2A> is `false`, the value of IgnoreErrorsDuringReload is ignored.
<xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> if the designer loader will ignore errors when it reloads; otherwise, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
The default is <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
